items.name: Flinch
meaning: Forces any <%=entity%> hit to play a "hurt" animation TODO find which one

items.name: Flash
meaning: Any hit <%=entity%> will temporarily be unable to be hit by attacks that need to make physical contact.

items.name: Stun
meaning: Any hit <%=entity%> will turn yellow and become unable to move for a period of time.

items.name: Root
meaning: Any hit <%=entity%> will be temporarily rooted in place and unable to move.

items.name: Impact
meaning: This attack requires physical contact to be able to hit an <%=entity%>.
_ There may be some unintentional behaviour if you accidentally don't include this flag._

items.name: Pierce
meaning: This attack ignores any 'invisibilty'/'invulnerability' effects on targets.

items.name: Retangible
meaning: This attack *removes* any 'invisibilty'/'invulnerability' effects on targets.

items.name: Breaking
meaning: This attack ignores any 'blocking' effects an on targets. (e.g. `Guard` chips)

items.name: Bubble
meaning: This attack traps any hit <%=entity%> in a bubble trap.

items.name: Freeze
meaning: This attack traps any hit <%=entity%> in an ice trap.

items.name: Drag
meaning: This attack will attempt to force any hit <%=entity%> to move.
_If this flag is not included, the <%=entity%> will **not** be moved by this attack._
